thread.section_title: LAICO Lake Victoria Entebbe Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Colonial hotel with large swimming pool
thread.title_full: Colonial hotel with large swimming pool - Review of LAICO Lake Victoria Entebbe Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: MLovei
title: Colonial hotel with large swimming pool
text:
Very close to the airport, convenient for short visits or conferences. The swimming pool is the best feature of the place. The gym is rather poor, especially the cardio part which only has a few rather old machines. The rooms are rather small, but work OK. Beds have mosquito net, and they also spray the rooms daily for mosquitos. The food at the restaurant is good, but service is very slow.
Room Tip: Rooms rooms are very far from the main area. See more room tips
